item.description:
Liquid Assets Screening per RI Monthly email:
Water is essential to our health, safety and well being, and yet most of us don't know much about the delivery system's aging infrastructure. The good news is you can learn everything you need to know about the topic at a free screening of the PBS documentary at the Convention Center. A discussion follows the screening.

The Details: May 18. 6 p.m. Free. Rhode Island Convention Center, 1 Sabin St., Providence, 458-6000, website: http://www.liquidasse...

Please join me. We could grab a bite or drink after the movie. We'll meet at 5:45 in the lobby. I'll provide a cell phone # to those who RSVP yes.
item.name: Free Screening of the movie Liquid Assets
